channel.title: To all the people who think autoban commands are safe
channel.description: For example,you make setitem auto ban you. But they can just go into the clients client.java, and search for setitem. They can change it to something else like 'starter'. And when they type it, you won't suspect anything Same with other commands such as noclip I'm just posting this because I seen too many servers command auto ban when they are useless if you have your own client..

item.title: To all the people who think autoban commands are safe
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

You don’t need to have to be a ‘haxz0rz’ to just change a command name

Read full topic
item.source: To all the people who think autoban commands are safe

item.title: To all the people who think autoban commands are safe
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

For example,you make setitem auto ban you.
But they can just go into the clients client.java, and search for setitem.
They can change it to something else like ‘starter’. And when they type it, you won’t suspect anything
Same with other commands such as noclip
I’m just posting this because I seen too many servers command auto ban when they are useless if you have your own client…

Read full topic
item.source: To all the people who think autoban commands are safe
